transcript:
Customer: Yes.
Helllo?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha sir bataiye.
Executive: Hi mam good afternoon. Shubham baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Bataiye mam.
Customer: Ji sir ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Ha mam maine to mam maine to aapka abhi aapko chart bheja inquiry flow ka. Aapka chart jaisa aap bol rahe ki nahi aa raha. Aapka inquiry chart to similar hi hai mam. Har mahine aapko jo range aa rahi hai 136, 135, 138 vahi inquiry flow to aa raha hai. Isme kam jyada kaha ho raha hai?
Customer: November tak kitni aayi hai?
Executive: November mein abhi tak 21 aayi hai aapke pass.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: November mein kam hai. Abhi November ka 21 aaya hai. November ka flow thoda sa gira hai. To ye to flow decrease hua hai na sir. Flow aapka kam hua hai abhi.
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Mam matlab aap dekhenge last three months se jab se aapne TrustSeal liya hua hai to sab time aapka flow aa raha hai. Abhi tak aapko 21 inquiry aayi hai jo month end tak aapki same pahuch jayegi 138, 140 tak.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap month wise dekhiye ye.
Customer: Sir IndiaMART se inquiry nahi aa rahi hai. Aaj sir jo pure aaj 15 days ho gaye aur sir 21 inquiry aayi hai. Single one day mein hi 21 inquiry aati hai hamari.
Executive: Aati hogi lekin jis time agar inquiry flow nahi hai market mein matlab us time pe demand nahi ho rahi hai kisi reason se nahi aa rahi hai. To isme ye thodi hai ki aapke pass nahi aa rahi hai kisi aur ko ja rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai mam aur ye sir ye jo season hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye bahut jyada demanding mein rehta hai nebulizer. Ye mein maan hi nahi sakti aap bol rahe hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mam abhi season start hua hai. Abhi just season start hua hai. Abhi abhi wo thand aayi nahi hai nebulizer ki demand badhti hai mujhe bhi pata hai. But abhi start hua hai season abhi just start hua hai. Aapko dikhega jaise December hoga December mein to aur badh jayegi inquiry flow aapka double ho jayega do guna jyada ho jayega.
Customer: Sir IndiaMART mein bas sell nahi karti hu mein offline bhi sell karti hu. Offline sales mein sir hum log 20, 50 case nebulizer sell kar dete hai.
Executive: Yes mam offline to kya hai ki jo bhi aapke jo matlab contacts hai sari chije wo aapko aa rahe hai. IndiaMART mein kya rehta hai ki aapke competition hai bahut sare log hai to wo aapko inquiry dal rahe hai unko inquiry dal rahe hai to unme se aisa nahi ki nahi kar rahe. Inquiry dal rahe hai usme se kis ek kisi ek se purchase kar rahe hai aisa ho raha hai.
Customer: Par sir hum samajh rahe hai lekin sir jo hamara rate hai wo sabse best hai. To ye competition hum beat kar sakte hai obviously baat hai.
Executive: To agar aisa hi hai aap competition sab kuch best kar sakte hai. To matlab aap sirf Gorakhpur aur ye area ko highlight karna ho to kaise karungi sir?
Customer: Kisko?
Executive: Rate ye jo price hai usko highlight karna ho jisse customer attract ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Price jab wo jaise hi aapka catalog kholega tab waha pe dikhta hai na ₹360 price likha hua hai.
Customer: Wo to janti hu otherwise koi aisa price tag hai to hamara.
Executive: Wo to mein fir matlab mein aap bolunga to fir wo wali chij ho jayegi wo to ye hota hai ki fir aapki website hai wo hai na website promotion kara rahe ho usme khole to sare sari chije ek sath dikh jaye aapka price highlighted sari chije usme dikh jaye.
Customer: Website hai hamara sir.
Executive: Nahi promote IndiaMART pe aapne promote nahi karaya hai na usko. Promote karana hota hai main to. Aur baki mam mein ye keh raha hu mein waise hi keh raha hu. For example mam jab aap itne bade matlab mein dekh raha hu itne bade supplier hai itne bade seller hai aap hai na is chij ke. Aapki itni badi company hai hai na. So matlab aur aap all India mein bechte honge all India bhi bechte honge.
Customer: Ha obviously.
Executive: All India bechte hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Pan India. To matlab mein to ye kahunga to aap apni listing matlab jo hai aapki jo abhi chal rahi hai to why don't you take sabse top listing on India matlab on India level ki aapka jab bhi koi nebulizer search kare doctor glucometer ya jo bhi hai to aapka naam sabse upar aaye taki sara jitna flow of inquiry ka wo aapki taraf aaye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Matlab aap itne badi seller mein isliye keh raha hu ki just for the new kyuki aap bol rahe ho ki aapko sabse jyada sales time pe to kya hota hai ki aap sabse top kyun nahi jaise India ka page khule jabse pehle ki hai na kisi ne ye glucometer hai na aapka kaun sa main product hai aapka?
Customer: Main product hai hamara.
Executive: Sir ek minute.
Customer: Morepen meter hai kya hai?
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha ha sir bataiye.
Executive: Mam maine mam aapko na link bheja aap ek bar join kare video meeting mein aapko dikhata hu bataate nahi mein dikhata hu. Video meeting sir mujhe sir aap 12:30 baje join kariye. 12:30.
Executive: Theek hai sorry. To 12:30 ka hi bhej deta hu aapko 12:30 join karna theek hai 15 minute baad.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries are not coming from IndiaMART.

- Wants to highlight price to attract customers.



Resolution:

- Executive shared inquiry flow chart.

- Suggested promoting the website on IndiaMART.

- Executive offered to show the process in video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a meeting link for 12:30.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, promotion, pricing

seller_categories.mcat_name: Dr Morepen Blood Glucose Test Strips
